name: kittenishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a humorous, silly way, especially as a way of attracting sexual attention: She sat kittenishly in his lap. "Why do I do it?" Belle kittenishly asks the camera. See
kittenish
More examplesFewer examplesHer eyes sparkled kittenishly.He jumped kittenishly on to the piano stool and stamped on the keys.His voice is almost kittenishly mocking.
